#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	long long int a,b,c,r,k,r1,s;
	cin>>a>>b;
	while(a!=0 && b!=0)
	{
	    k=0;
	    s=0;
	    c=0;
	    while(a!=0 || b!=0)
	    {
	        r=a%10;
	        r1=b%10;
	       s=r+r1+k;
	       if(s>9)
	       {
	           c++;
	           k=1;
	       }
	       a=a/10;
	       b=b/10;
	       s=0;
	        
	    }
	   if(c==0)
	    cout<<"No carry operation."<<endl;
	    else if(c==1)
	    cout<<c<<" carry operation."<<endl;
	    else
	    cout<<c<<" "<<"carry operations."<<endl;
	    cin>>a>>b;
	}
	return 0;
}
